name: Good Boy (Alpha31)
description:
Development team:

Artist/Game Designer:  Cristini Dias da Silveira.

Artist/Game Designer:  Pedro Henrique de Toledo Menezes.

Programmer: Matheus Santolin.

Programmer/Game Design/Sound Designer: Yuri Oliveira Peretti.

∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎

Description:

In Good Boy, you need to help Diabeto, a little demon, who wants to ascend to heaven. To do so, you must hit the musical notes in the right rhythm, this will create small platforms that will gradualy build his path to his long awaited goal.

The game relation with the game jam's theme happens when you hit the notes right, building the path to heaven, but if you miss the rhythm or don't hit the notes your path will be dismantled little by little.

This game is part of the first Univali-Xamk international Game Jam 2022.

∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎∎

Credits:

Softwares:

Game Production - Unity.

Artistic Production - Photoshop and Aseprite.
